p: In this study, from the ROC curves, AUC values were used to evaluate the performance of the MaxEnt model. Many studies showed that an AUC of high values led to better results that significantly differed from the random predictions. The accuracy of prediction of Psa during the current period was found to be “excellent” (AUC mean = 0.963, Fig 1) according to the identified evaluation criteria ( S3 Table).
